item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans!!!

Join me for this great event. It's a great chance to dress up, take pictures and dance the night away.


"This December 4, 2010, the beautiful Empire Ballroom at the Courtyard Marriott Downtown Boston will be home to Masacote's Black and White Salsa Ball, an exhilarating evening of salsa shows, dinner, live music, networking, photo ops, and dancing. Bring your most elegant dress and pick out your best tux to Boston's First Black Tie Salsa Affair.

Become infused with the intoxicating energy that has made salsa a worldwide craze by world renowned music and dance artists invited directly to Boston. Get ready to experience an Unforgettable Night of Networking, Mingling, and Festivities...

* Dance lesson starting at 7pm
* Salsa Shows by International and National Artists
* Live Concert by Critically Acclaimed Ritmo Masacote
* Salsa Dancing to the Live Band and DJ Rob Suave
* Door Prizes Raffled throughout evening! (must be present to win)
* Professional Photography Services & Red Carpet Photos
* Special Photo Ops Available for Purchase during the night! "

For Schedule and more info:
Visit Website: http://www.blackandwh...

I look forward to dancing with you all.

see you soon,

-Angel S.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing my fedora hat!!!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Black and White Salsa CHARITY Ball 2010!
